backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor handling user registration for multiple roles, superadmin claiming, and access control integration with generated user IDs.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two frontend patches related to InternalLogin behavior and their associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of all frontend source files including pages, dashboards, hooks, and backend reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme CSS defining OKLCH color tokens and dark mode variables for global styling.
frontend/index.html: Static HTML entry file containing root div and script loader for the frontend React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React app using manual pathname-based routing to render pages and dashboards without external router libraries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refetching dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity provider and hook managing AuthClient login, stored identity restoration, and logout behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hook calling actor.canCreateTaskUI to determine task creation UI permissions.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining extensive CSS variables for themes and applying global base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry point initializing QueryClient and wrapping App with providers.
frontend/src/pages/client/ClientLogin.ts: Client login page displaying disabled login options and navigation links.
frontend/src/pages/client/ClientRegister: Client registration form with fields for name, email, WhatsApp, and company.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/AdminDashb: Admin dashboard with a disabled logout button and a simple status message.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/AsistenmuD: Assistant dashboard showing a gratitude message and disabled logout.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/ClientDash: Client dashboard showing task creation availability via query hook.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/ConciergeD: Concierge dashboard displaying an appreciation message and disabled logout.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/FinanceDas: Finance dashboard with a message about maintaining healthy flow and disabled logout.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/PartnerDas: Partner dashboard with a motivational message and disabled logout.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/Superadmin: Superadmin dashboard displaying a control message and disabled logout.
frontend/src/pages/internal/InternalLand: Internal access landing page offering internal login and registration options.
frontend/src/pages/internal/InternalLogi: Implements internal login flow using Internet Identity, handling role extraction, superadmin claim checks, and navigation based on user role.
frontend/src/pages/internal/InternalRegi: Static internal registration form with fields for name, email, WhatsApp, and role selection.
frontend/src/pages/Landing.tsx: Landing page offering client and partner login or registration links.
Partner login page with disabled Internet Identity and workspace login buttons, plus navigation links.
frontend/src/pages/partner/PartnerRegist: Static partner registration form collecting basic info, skills, and domicile.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session storage values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, animations, and layout settings with plugins.
project_state.json: Defines current project state, scope, architectural rules, known issues, and feature constraints for frontend and backend. Highlights that only backend/main.mo may change for the current fix request and that the frontend must remain static except InternalLogin.tsx.
